description: Variation of conditions 2 (compliance with submitted plans) and 8 (external materials) of permission ref. 24/00694/FULL1 granted for demolition of existing bungalow and erection of a pair of two storey 3 bedroom semi-detached dwellings with associated hard and soft landscaping, car and cycle parking, refuse storage and boundary treatment, in order to make the following amendments: (1) New Single Storey Rear Addition: finished in brickwork to match the already approved, with patio extended to suit(2) New Loft and Rear Dormer Addition: with dormer finished in dark grey metal cladding(3) New rooflights: in the main roof above the new loft space(4) Main Roof Height: aligned with the front roof pitch(5) Rear and Side Ground Floor Windows: slightly enlarged(6) Solar Panels: amended locations on the main roof (7)  External Glazing: aluminium frames changed in colour from white to dark grey
decision_conditions: Car Parking Details to be Implemented
